sprite.name: Thwomp
sprite.notes: Loaded Files: dossun.szs Actor: 0x226 Notes: Thwomps are living stones that are usually rectangular in shape and made their first appearance in the Super Mario Bros. 3. They typically attempt to fall on and flatten or squash whoever passes below them. They can only be defeated by being touched by Mario when he is powered up with a Super Star. It is suggested in Mario & Luigi: Partners in Time that Thwomps may in fact be born from volcanic activity.

sprite.name: Pipe - Up
sprite.notes: This sprite seems to be required for pipes to work correctly in-game. If this pipe is inside a quicksand (maybe other liquids as well) location, another pipe has to be placed directly on top of it to make the pipe show in front of the quicksand (maybe other liquids as well)...

list.title: Height-related
list.comment: For value(s) with an asterisk, 2 blocks are added to the height. Other values cause an increment of one block to the height.

list.title: Type
list.comment:
If the type is "Painted", 1 block extra is added to the height.

If the type is "Giant", 2 blocks extra are added to the height.

There probably is a fourth option...

list.title: Color
list.comment: Set the color of your pipe! Value 3 is blue if the type is painted (or is it related to "height-related"?)

value.title: Height
value.comment: Value + 1 by default. If height-related is a value with an asterisk, the increment is 2 instead of 1. Additionally, another 2 blocks are added to the height if the type is "Big", or 1 extra block if the type is "Painted".

sprite.name: Pipe - Down
sprite.notes: This sprite seems to be required for pipes to work correctly in-game. If this pipe is inside a quicksand (maybe others as well) location, another pipe has to be placed directly on top of it to make the pipe show in front of the quicksand (maybe others as well)...

list.title: Type
list.comment:
If the type is "Painted", 1 block extra is added to the length.

If the type is "Giant", 2 blocks extra are added to the length.

There probably is a fourth option...

sprite.name: Boo
sprite.notes: Boos are a type of white spherical ghost with menacing and constantly open mouths. They are known for their large tongues and small "arms" of some sort. However, the most distinctive characteristic of the Boos is their shy personality, where they cover their faces when someone looks them directly at the face. They will uncover their faces once the subject turns around.

sprite.notes: Loaded Files: kakibo.szs Goombrats are a species of Goomba that are lighter brown, and resemble persimmons more than mushrooms. They have different facial features, and the black stems on their head are similar to tomato leaves. They also turn when they reach edges, which is similar to the behaviour of red Koopa Troopas.
